EmailTemplate.name: NUR-2021FY-LEAD-GEN-FOLLOW-UP-PROGRAM.Kris - 2A
EmailTemplate.subject: Teladoc Health: Introductory Call
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Hello}},
Our goal at Teladoc Health is to help relieve some of the common issues employers like yourself often deal with — lowering healthcare costs, improving access to care, and increasing productivity.
I wanted to reach out again after my voicemail and email to extend an invitation to book some time on my calendar to further discuss Teladoc Health. Here is the link: https://calendly.com/krisfloyd/15-minute-teladoc-chat
Again, feel free to book time for a quick introductory call to address any of your questions regarding Teladoc Health.
Regards, Kris
Kris Floyd Lead Development Representative Teladoc Health, Inc.
O (855) 549-2214 | C (830) 734–3138 kris.floyd@teladochealth.com
